forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High around 60F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 51F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 60F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 66F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 15C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 58F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High around 65F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 18C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then becoming windy with periods of rain later in the day. High 66F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 14C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with a steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 56F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 64F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 19C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 65F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 68F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 53F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 73F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 53F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
